pages.title: Pastel Network
pages.text: Your primitive ways of item transport like $(thing)Hopper Arrays$() do not compare to the $(thing)Pastel Network$() - this is what you named clusters of Azurite-based nodes.$(br)Placed in close proximity, nodes will connect wirelessly to one another and form an item transfer network.

pages.title: Transfer Routes
pages.text: The way nodes can interact with one another. They do not require line of sight.
